name: The Christmas Script
author: TPI, with the JSON by Josh

name: Buddy the Elf
ability: You start knowing who Kris Kringle is. [+ Kris Kringle]

firstNightReminder: Kris Kringle points to at least three players. Record how many of those selected are evil, and tell them the following day in private.
otherNightReminder: Kris Kringle points to at least three players. Record how many of those selected are evil, and tell them the following day in private.
name: Kris Kringle
ability: Each night, choose three or more players. The next day, you may privately ask the Storyteller how many of those you selected the previous night were evil.

firstNightReminder: Mrs Claus points to one player.
otherNightReminder: Mrs Claus points to one player. Check if the previous two choices were both good: if so, Mrs Claus dies.
name: Mrs Claus
ability: Each night, choose a player. If the last two players you chose were both good, you die.

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of players (excluding Rudolph) who awoke this night.
name: Rudolph
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players woke up (not including yourself).

otherNightReminder: Captain Bob Wallace pointsto three players. If at least two are evil, show them an arbitrary character. Otherwise, show them the character of one of the players they chose.
name: Captain Bob Wallace
ability: Each night*, choose three players. You learn one of their charachers. If two of your choices are evil, you recieve false information.

otherNightReminder: Jack Skellington points to two players. If Jack Skellington chooses the demon, note the other player they chose. When you wake the demon, show the 'This character chose you' card, followed by the Jack Skellington Token. Point to Jack Skellington and the other player that Jack Skellington chose, the demon may only choose one of those two players.
name: Jack Skellington
ability: Each night*, choose two players. If you choose the Demon, they can only choose you or the other player you chose.

otherNightReminder: Mark if a good player uses their ghost vote on another good player. If the nominated good player is executed, give the voting good player a new ghost vote token.
name: Santa's Little Helper
ability: The first time a good player uses their ghost vote on another good player, if the nominated good player is executed, they regain their ghost vote that night.

otherNightReminder: Players may call for a vote to resurrect. If all good players vote in favor, resurrect a good player the following night.
name: Clarence Odbody
ability: Once per game, if all good players choose to, one player who died the previous night is resurrected tonight.

name: Kevin McCallister
ability: Once per game, you may publicly choose a player. If you select the Wet Bandits, they die, and the demon is drunk for the following night. [+ Wet Bandits]

name: Billy Mack
ability: Once per game, you may publicly choose a number of players up to the starting number of evil players. All players chosen are drunk for the following night.

name: Frosty the Snowman
ability: If Santa Claus is alive and in play, you may not die at night. [+ Santa Claus]

otherNightReminder: If a Santa Claus died tonight, choose another good player and make them the Farmer. Wake this player, show them the 'You are' card and the Farmer character token.
name: Santa Claus
ability: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes Santa Claus

name: Arthur Christmas
ability: If you are nominated by an evil player, they are drunk for the following night.

name: Ghost of Christmas Past
ability: If you are executed, an evil player who acted last night gets to act again tonight.

otherNightReminder: It the Ghost of Christmas Present was executed, wake each evil player who voted for the Ghost of Christmas Present. Show them the charachter token of a player who voted for the Ghost of Christmas Present.
name: Ghost of Christmas Present
ability: If you are executed, that night, each evil player who voted for you learns an in-play character who voted for you.

id: Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
name: Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
ability: If you are executed, a townsfolk who voted for you is drunk from now on.

otherNightReminder: If Scrooge was executed, choose a good townsfolk and make them evil.
name: Scrooge
ability: If one of the Ghosts activates, they activate twice instead. If you are executed, a townsfolk becomes evil tonight.

firstNightReminder: Jack Frost points at a player. Do not wake that player tonight. Their ability may not be activated the next day.
otherNightReminder: Jack Frost points at a player. Do not wake that player tonight. Their ability may not be activated the next day.
name: Jack Frost
ability: Each night, choose a player: they do not wake tonight, and they cannot use their ability during the day tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: If the Wet Bandits have publicly guessed Kevin McCallister, the Wet Bandits point at a player. That player dies.
name: Wet Bandits
ability: Once per game, you may publicly choose a player. If you select Kevin McCallister, you may not die while Kevil McCallister lives, and you may choose a player to die each night. [+ Kevin McCallister]

name: Boogie's Boys
ability: The first night, select three good players: at least one is poisoned.

otherNightReminder: Gremlin points at a player. They die.
name: Gremlin
ability: If a good player said Gremlin, if you are selected by a good player, or if you are nominated but not executed, wake up tonight and choose a player: they die.

otherNightReminder: Grinch points at a player: they are drunk, and they die before the next day. Grinch gains the ability of the player they select for that night.
name: Grinch
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they are drunk tonight, and die before dawn. You have the ability of the player you select until they die.

otherNightReminder: Grinch points at a player: they are drunk, and they die before the next day. Grinch gains the ability of the player they select for that night.
name: Krampus
ability: Each night*, if a good player died since you last acted, choose a player: they die. If an evil player died, you choose two players instead.

firstNightReminder: Mr. Oogie Boogie points at a minion. If Mr. Oogie Boogie dies, they become Mr. Oogie Boogie.
otherNightReminder: Mr. Oogie Boogie points at a player: they die.
name: Mr Oogie Boogie
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The first night, choose a minion: if you die, they become Mr. Oogie Boogie.

otherNightReminder: Hans Gruber gives a hand signal (thumbs up or down) to signal how they register tonight. If they choose to register as evil, Hans Gruber points at a player: they die.
name: Hans Gruber
ability: Each night*, you may choose to register as a Townsfolk or Demon. If you choose to register as a Demon, choose a player: they die.
